title: Retraction: Effects of environmental impact labels on the sustainability of food purchases: Two randomised controlled trials in an experimental online supermarket
content: by Christina Potter, Rachel Pechey, Michael Clark, Kerstin Frie, Paul A. Bateman, Brian Cook, Cristina Stewart, Carmen Piernas, John Lynch, Mike Rayner, Joseph Poore, Susan A. Jebb, the PLOS ONE Editors
author: Christina Potter
